soul.Name: legacy-dev-cluster
soul.Reason:
Idle Control Plane: Active EKS cluster with zero compute nodes for > 7 days.
Deleting this cluster will leave 1 Orphaned ELBs behind. Here is the CLI command to delete them too:
aws elbv2 delete-load-balancer --load-balancer-arn arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:loadbalancer/app/k8s-legacy-service/50dc6c495c0c9188
